classScheduleInformation: Work may be taken in the following Architectural areas: Design, History, Theory, Structures, Practice and Technology.
courseSectionInformation: 0 to 4 undergraduate hours. 0 to 4 graduate hours.  Approved for both letter and S/U grading. May be repeated. Prerequisite: Junior standing in architecture, written proposal approved by a sponsoring faculty member and the approval of the Director of the School.
description: Independent guided study and investigation in a selected area of architecture. 0 to 4 undergraduate hours. 0 to 4 graduate hours.  Approved for both letter and S/U grading. May be repeated. Prerequisite: Junior standing in architecture, written proposal approved by a sponsoring faculty member and the approval of the Director of the School.
label: Independent Study
